Has all benefits of bridge adapter
on the same network with service names

interface that creates a trunk for dedicated
container communication via that sub interface
can connect with other containers in
same same network as well as other
subnets which are defined while creating
the network. This adapter works on Layer 3.
To allow these containers to access the internet,
a custom static route has to be defined in the
